action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 3d12 + 12}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Snatch.
entries: The giant tries to grab a Small or Medium creature within 10 feet of it and hold it in its hand. The target must succeed on a Strength or Dexterity saving throw, being {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} by the giant. A giant can snatch one Small or Medium creature in each of its hands. If a giant starts its turn with one or more snatched creatures in hand, it can use a bonus action to use smash, chew, rip, or crush against one of those creatures.

action.name: Squash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 6d6 + 12}) bludgeoning damage. The giant lands {@condition prone} in the target's space, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition prone}. The grapple ends early if the giant stands up.

action.name: Weighted Nets
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one small, medium or large target. {@h} The target is {@condition restrained} until it escapes the net. Any creature can use its action to make a {@dc 17} Strength check to free itself or another creature in the net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 15 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) destroys the net and frees the target.

action.name: Fling.
entries: The giant tries to throw a Small or Medium creature within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or be hurled up to 60 feet horizontally in a direction of the giant's choice and land {@condition prone}, taking {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown.

trait.name: Tackle.
entries: When the giant enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Smash
entries: The giant smashes a snatched creature into the ground for {@damage 4d6 + 6}  bludgeoning damage. The creature is no longer snatched.

bonus.name: Chew
entries: The giant bites a snatched creature in half, dealing {@damage 6d8 + 6} piercing damage. If this reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is killed, and half of the target is swallowed or spat out by the giant. The creature is no longer snatched.

bonus.name: Rip
entries: The giant uses two hands to rip a snatched creature apart, dealing {@damage 6d10 + 6} slashing damage. If this reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is killed, and creatures within 50' of the giant that are hostile to it must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the giant until the start of the giant's next turn. The creature is no longer snatched.

bonus.name: Crush
entries: The giant squeezes a snatched creature dealing {@damage 4d6 + 6} bludgeoning damage to the creature, the creature remains snatched.
